description: Non-material amendment to Condition 4 (Emergency Generators) of planning permission 2022/1515/P dated 20/02/2023 for 'Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission 2020/3881/P granted 01/11/2021 for the 'Redevelopment of Belgrove House as a part 5 part 10 storey building plus 2 basement levels for use as office and research and laboratory floorspace; with café, flexible retail and office floorspace at ground floor; an auditorium at basement; incorporating step free entrance to Kings Cross Underground station in place of two entrance boxes along Euston Road; together with terraces at fourth and fifth floor levels, servicing, cycle storage and facilities, refuse storage and other ancillary and associated works'; namely, minor design changes to external façade treatment and Euston Road entrance; changes to cycle store entrance at ground floor and public realm; internal alterations to layout across various floors; and changes to PVs and plant layout at roof level (summary)' approved; NAMELY: to change trigger for submission of details for Condition 4.
